page.title: 07Village Hall
page.content: Brockenhurst {Village Hall}was built and opened in 1982,at a cost of Â£104,000.The money was raised by many fund-raising activites over several years and supported with money from the County ,Parish and District Councils. Brockenhurst Village Hall is a useful community,an ideal venue for meetings ,social and sporting events,comferences and parties.There are three rooms,The Beech Room,Oak Room and Forest Hall,which can accommodate 200,60 and 40 persons respectively.The well-equipped kitchen can provide food for at least 100 persons.The variety of sports equipment and the variable-height mobile stage are attractive facilities for sporting and social occasions.
